7c0dbe95c78baac940d1489f96a4eb5bffa6058e56","dweb:/ipfs/QmPpXpQ8nTxG7e2FhwzcMxN2cWjvoXTsjJdFdzwnyfBLHK"]},"src/libraries/Utils.sol":{"keccak256":"0xd5a309e14dfd0dc32b3e63774c8cd8390d9ec1c9d89108a034fa1d7bb1f4125a","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://338ab878a10892384badddb7520bdf67a44cdc1e6a04f9ae3699402344ff26df","dweb:/ipfs/QmS49Xuo1iED9EXowDmF2QSqa8cJ7tQ72n7wQMqeVEzLXP"]}},"version":1}

getPrice(address).details: selects the data which has the largest price deviation from ONE (WAD) if data from both oracles is availableif only pyth is available, it returns the data from the pyth price oracleif only spot is available, revert

params.asset: The asset of which to fetch the price.

getPriceNoOlderThan(address,uint256).details: if only pyth is available, it returns the data from the pyth price oracleif only spot is available, revert

getPriceUnsafe(address).details: selects the data which has the largest price deviation from ONE (WAD) if data from both oracles is availableif only pyth is available, it returns the data from the pyth price oracleif only spot is available, revert

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

initialize(address).details: do not use constructor in order to predict the contract address

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.pythOracle_: The new address of the pyth oracle.

params.spotOracle_: The new address of the spot oracle.

getPriceUnsafe(address).notice: Returns the price without any sanity checks.

priceAvailable(address).notice: Returns whether a price is available or not.

spotOracle().notice: spot price oracle of BEX pool

documentation.text: @notice spot price oracle of BEX pool
@dev do not use constructor in order to predict the contract address

@notice Sets the spot oracle.
 @param spotOracle_ The new address of the spot oracle.

@notice Sets the pyth oracle.
 @param pythOracle_ The new address of the pyth oracle.

 @dev if only spot is available, revert
